name: Trash Digger X-Treme
description:
It's 198X in Stoke-On-Trent and a young dwarf is on his way to donate a big bag of cash to charity, when he tragically trips over and drops the money into a pile of trash! It's now your job to dig through the trash to collect the dropped money to give to charity!

Controls:

  • 'A' and 'D' to move left and right.
  • 'Space' to jump.
  • Press 'Space' in mid-air to equip pickaxe.
  • Hold 'Space' when landing on a block with a pick to break it and get a jump boost.
  • Let go of 'Space' when landing on a block to unequip pickaxe.
